#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,b,count;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
         count=1;
        if(n==1)
                {cout<<"0";
                continue;}
        else
        {
        b=sqrt(n);
 
        for(i=2;i<=b;i++)
        {
                if(n%i==0)
                {
 
                        count=count+i;
                        if(i!=(n/i))
                        count=count+(n/i);
 
                }
        }
        }
 
        cout<<count<<endl;
 
        }
 
        return 0;
}
